text: Christine Diane Teigen (born November 30, 1985) is an American model, television personality and author. She made her debut in the annual Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2010 and, alongside Nina Agdal and Lily Aldridge, appeared on the cover in 2014. Since 2015, she co-hosts Lip Sync Battle with LL Cool J on Paramount Network. Teigen married the singer John Legend on September 14, 2013. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Models from Utah Category:American television personalities Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Writers from Utah Category:Actors from Utah Category:American bloggers
